languages.text: Hitting enemies with this blade inflicts Can’t Attack for 1 round on failed TGH (+30) Test

languages.text: この武器で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した対象は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に−30のペナルティを受けて成功する必要があり、失敗した場合は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}攻撃不可{/g}状態になる。

traits.locale_text: この武器で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した対象は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に−30のペナルティを受けて成功する必要があり、失敗した場合は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}攻撃不可{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} этим оружием противник выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −30 и в случае провала получает эффект {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}неспособность атаковать{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} из этого оружия противник выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −30 и в случае провала получает эффект {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}неспособность атаковать{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: Mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −30 bestehen. Misslingt die Probe, können sie 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}nicht angreifen{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −30 penalty or suffer {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −30 bestehen. Misslingt die Probe, können sie 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}nicht angreifen{/g}.

languages.text: Bu silahla {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulan{/g} hedefler, −30 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}saldıramazlar{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

traits.locale_text: Bu silahla {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulan{/g} hedefler, −30 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}saldıramazlar{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text: Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} avec cette arme doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de −30. En cas d'échec, elles ne {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}peuvent plus attaquer{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

En cas d'échec, elles ne {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}peuvent plus attaquer{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por esta arma deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −30 o sufrirán el efecto {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}no puede atacar{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −30 penalty or suffer {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por esta arma deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −30 o sufrirán el efecto {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}no puede atacar{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 被这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-30减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}无法攻击{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
